data.title: Christopher Koch
data.text:
Christopher Koch occupies an undeniably prominent place in contemporary Australian fiction. This is explained in part by his longevity as a writer. Born in 1932â¦

Like Patrick White and Randolph Stow. Christopher Koch explores in his fiction the post-colonial Australian identity, not in an exclusively political sense, but rather inâ¦
